channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1462622005216223235
item.description: El portal de datos abiertos del gobierno, lleva la cuenta de las menciones en redes sociales y el “comportamiento estadístico con respecto a seguidores, interacciones, publicaciones y “me gusta” que tiene la profepa 🤔 https://t.co/AO6tf0XfCt

item.title: #es @ 1462621518077255681
item.description:
A escala nacional 🇵🇪 #DatosAbiertos
Los casos diarios #COVID19 vienen incrementando desde inicios de Nov/2021. Sin embargo, a bien gracias, no se percibe un incremento o punto de quiebre al alza en los fallecimientos diarios.
#SigamosCuidándonos #NoBajemosLaGuardia https://t.co/uMtO6N22rC

item.title: #es @ 1462586035611873285
item.description:
Fuente: datos elaborados por Juan Jose Illingworth @JJELMATEMATICO de 4 grupos de cementerios que operan cercanos a Guayaquil.
Agrupados en base de datos abiertos Ecuacovid @cocoronata

item.title: #en @ 1462572185831325701
item.description:
So data from #blockchains and other sources processed by @graphprotocol indexers could be the most valuable data on the #web3 in the future!
#TheGraph #GRT $GRT #decentralized #opendata #BigData #DataAnalytics #staking #cryptocurrency #dApp #dev #DeFi #innovation #Crypto https://t.co/kegJnUIPsd

item.title: #en @ 1462489933734723595
item.description:
Maybe it’s time to dig into the non-blockchain smart contract idea that’s been floating around for a while. Drop the PoW and transaction fees, but maintain the trustless verification and open data/code
Maybe appealing to people who don’t 100% like how Web3 works right now

item.title: #es @ 1462461905482797060
item.description: @sophiahenriquez Eso dicen, pero sin datos abiertos pueden poner lo que quieran en una imagen. ¿Y de la caducidad se sabe algo?

item.title: #es @ 1462457227978190849
item.description: Las dudas se despejarían si hubiera datos abiertos de vacunación porque sin transparencia yo no le creo al gobierno.

item.title: #ja @ 1462429119056998402
item.description:
【2021年11月20日 九州地方の火山性地震】
阿蘇山 382回 398⤵︎⚠️⚠️⚠️ 雲仙岳 1回 2 ↘︎ 霧島山（えびの高原（硫黄山）周辺）1回→ 霧島山（新燃岳）4回→ 桜島 6回 1 ⬆️※注 薩摩硫黄島 6回 5少⤵︎ 口永良部島 3回 2少⤵︎ 諏訪之瀬島 2回 9↘︎
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ

item.title: #en @ 1462427450655350793
item.description: While I was sick my team worked with our fabulous colleagues in @P_H_S_Official and @NHSEngland to change the way we ingest open data for Scotland and it has made a huge difference to our processes. Thank you teams! Shows that after 18+ months of doing this we can still improve!

item.title: #en @ 1462421846708695049
item.description:
This 1s a bit tricky (& polarizing):
GREAT: #DataSeason has begun!
In opinion only, Meta partnered with $ROSE for *private* data exchange = maintaining the Facebook data silo
The rest of the business & institution world adopt $OCEAN for a new *open* data economy🧠🧐
Showdown! https://t.co/Sysp638Mtq

item.title: #en @ 1462414392394502154
item.description:
How can Indexers of the @graphprotocol easily and quickly calculate allocation size, so as to optimize indexing rewards for themselves and their Delegators?
#Decentralized #indexing of #Web3 with #TheGraph #GRT $GRT #Blockchain #Tools #OpenData https://t.co/KyJYOIPjvT

item.title: #en @ 1462410733564669960
item.description:
#Copernicus for #EUArctic
Copernicus #OpenData and services allow the development of authoritative assessments of the state of #SeaIce coverage
This #Sentinel3 🇪🇺🛰️mosaic, made up of multiple images, provides evidence of the absence of sea ice in the Laptev Sea in May 2021 https://t.co/FWLEUNHDp8

item.title: #pt @ 1462408262599462913
item.description: A presidente da Fundação Casa de Rui Barbosa, FCRB, Letícia Dornelles, comunica que nosso Plano de Dados Abertos completo estará disponível para consulta em https://t.co/6vdIB6QR6A (Portal Brasileiro de Dados Abertos), na 2ª quinzena de dezembro de 2021. Gestão transparente.

item.title: #en @ 1462397375276896260
item.description: #30DayMapChallenge Day 21 - Elevation Area around #Toubkal, highest mountain of #Morocco and North Africa (4167 m), located in the Atlas Mountains. Styled in #QGIS using #Tanaka contours. #OpenData: SRTM DEM and peaks from #OpenStreetMap https://t.co/yurbIoaAEP

item.title: #es @ 1462391781077790726
item.description:
La semana pasada salió una de mis estadísticas favoritas: Mercado de trabajo y pensiones en las fuentes tributarias. Esta vez con info de 2020. https://t.co/nzatCLtN5g.
Voy a intentar hacer un hilo

item.title: #fr @ 1462377047582466051
item.description:
4/4
Il est intéressant aussi de rapporter le nombre d'encombrants à la population. Sur cette période d'une semaine, cela donne, pour tout Paris, environ 1 pour 100 habitants (mais 1,2 dans les 17e et 10e, par exemple).
A quand la publication de ces données en open data ? https://t.co/hv75rtdpKg

item.title: #en @ 1462371173870751751
item.description:
#Copernicus for #ClimateChange impact monitoring
Our #OpenData supports a multitude of #marine applications in areas such as monitoring sea-level rise, coral reef, marine debris etc.
#Sentinel2 🇪🇺🛰️image of the Kwajalein Atoll, one of the areas at risk in the Marshall Islands https://t.co/WibdEQJxzP

item.title: #en @ 1462314858913972227
item.description:
How can we define data domains and storage? Traditionally, an ecosystem orchestrator would centralize data within each field. More recent trends in data-asset management favor an open data-mesh architecture.
Source @McKinsey Link https://t.co/iPgpCt9kWS @antgrasso #DataLiteracy https://t.co/XQNomAb4ZS

item.title: #en @ 1461818690110996483
item.description: Janine Bijsterbosch, PhD, is NeuroImage's new Open Data Replication Report Editor as part of a scientific data-sharing initiative. Reports will use openly available data to replicate a published study's findings, but with independent code. Congrats, Dr. Bijsterbosch! #MIRresearch https://t.co/wB3ZhjZfdE https://t.co/ig9Hdp094t

item.title: #en @ 1461803045088645127
item.description:
New to #OpenData? You might be wondering:
👉 Is data sharing even a ‘thing’ in my field? 👉 Do I have the rights to share my data? 👉 Will my research be scooped if I share?
In this blog post, you’ll find the answers to these questions and more ⬇️ https://t.co/O9b8O4m14T

item.title: #es @ 1461797581340692489
item.description: EMA da luz verde a los países miembros para autorización de uso de emergencia de molnupiravir - en paralelo se sigue procedimiento de autorización de comercialización. Se acelera el procedimiento de agencias antiviral oral y mientras seguimos sin datos abiertos 🤔 https://t.co/adwUuoHSXL

item.title: #es @ 1461774190273572867
item.description: Según la investigación, desde AGO2020 hasta NOV2020, buscaron portales de votantes estatales y de uno de ellos (de #DatosAbiertos, disponibles para consultar y usar) descargaron información sobre más de 100.000 personas.

item.title: #en @ 1461762078126055428
item.description:
I made an automated dataset that checks the NYC open data portal to determine which datasets were updated yesterday.
It runs every 24 hours and will keep itself fresh. Take a look 👀
https://t.co/DATAa0YgDJ https://t.co/zVzSVyhH4m
